articles.content:
THE Sydney Roosters are a beach club undergoing a re-build following the departure of $2 million worth of playing talent.

articles.content:
Arsenal beat Wolves at Molineux 1-0 on Thursday night in the Premier League thanks to a first-half Gabriel Magalhaes goal despite playing much of the second half down a man.

articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: Sources - Dallas Mavericks trading Kristaps Porzingis to Washington Wizards for Spencer Dinwiddie, Davis Bertans - ESPN Australia
articles.description: The Mavericks are trading Kristaps Porzingis and a second-round pick to the Wizards for Spencer Dinwiddie and Davis Bertans, sources told ESPN. Washington also is sending center Montrezl Harrell to Charlotte for Vernon Carey and Ish Smith, sources said.
articles.content: The Dallas Mavericks have agreed to trade center/power forward Kristaps Porzingis and a second-round pick to the Washington Wizards for guard Spencer Dinwiddie and forward Davis Bertans, sources told… [+3266 chars]
